# Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Notice**
Trade Agreement: Canada-EU Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and Free Trade Agreements with Peru, Colombia, Panama, Korea, and the United Kingdom.

**Notice Type**
Request for Proposal (RFP) for the supply and delivery of diesel fuel for generators at various government facilities within the National Capital Region (NCR), on an urgent and as-needed basis.

**Request for Proposal Overview**
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for the supply and delivery of diesel fuel for generators in government facilities within the National Capital Area (NCA) on a 24/7 basis during emergency situations. The RFP aims to establish Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISOs) for the supply and delivery of diesel fuel to these facilities.

**RFP Details**
* Tendering Process: All interested suppliers can submit a bid.
* Competitive Procurement Strategy: Best Overall Proposal.
* Nature of Requirements: The RFP seeks to establish relationships with up to 10 suppliers, with up to 5 Standing Offers per province (Ontario and Quebec), for a total of 2 years.
* Delivery Date: The delivery date is as stated above.

**Documents Required**
Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Suppliers can access the solicitation documents on [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Key Dates**
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-12-16T14:00:00.
* Amendment Date: 2022-12-09.
* Publication Date: 2022-10-25.

**Additional Information**
The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. For more information, please contact Ian Arboleda at [Ian.Arboleda@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Ian.Arboleda@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) or (343) 543-4040. Directed correspondence shall not be sent. elic revisions Core sent,
